New_Haven.Cullman-Heyman Tennis Center: The Cullman-Heyman Tennis Center is an 8-court indoor intercollegiate tennis facility located on the campus of Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut. The Cullman-Heyman Tennis Center is part of the Yale University tennis complex which consists of 17 outdoor and 8 indoor DecoTurf hardcourts. Across Yale Avenue from the Yale Tennis Complex is the Connecticut Tennis Center Stadium, which hosts the women's professional tournament called the Connecticut Open.
